description: All Riley Mitchel wants is to get ahead in life, and he’s gotten to the point where he will do whatever it takes. He’s a smart and driven guy, but sometimes that’s not enough. Thankfully, he’s also a sex-crazed muscle bear who is ready to rip off his suit and fuck around with other guys bareback. When Dirk Caber and Dylan James propose this idea to him so he can take his career to the next level, what’s a guy to do but comply?
title: Riley Mitchel Services His Bosses Dylan James And Dirk Caber
